tool_description: The Wizart Vision API offers powerful photo analysis capabilities for home interiors, providing comprehensive data for windows, doors, walls, ceiling, floor, and more. Access detailed information on individual surfaces or obtain a holistic overview of the entire interior in one request.
name: Vision API
title: Vision API

api_list.name: /segmentation/floor
api_list.description: Get a binary floor mask represented as an image encoded as a base64 string in the normal case. Or vectorized_mask as a list of (x, y) points if vectorized is set to true in the query options. These points describe a polygon around a binary mask from a regular query. Convenient if the server response size is painful for you.

api_list.name: /analysis
api_list.description: Get analysis data that contains all the information that was extracted for the uploaded photo. Includes virtual camera settings and photo quality data.

api_list.name: /segmentation/windows
api_list.description: Get a binary windows mask represented as an image encoded as a base64 string in the normal case. Or vectorized_mask as a list of (x, y) points if vectorized is set to true in the query options. These points describe a polygon around a binary mask from a regular query. Convenient if the server response size is painful for you.

api_list.name: /segmentation/walls
api_list.description: Get a binary walls mask represented as an image encoded as a base64 string in the normal case. Or vectorized_mask as a list of (x, y) points if vectorized is set to true in the query options. These points describe a polygon around a binary mask from a regular query. Convenient if the server response size is painful for you.

api_list.name: /analysis/image-info
api_list.description: Get data about the quality characteristics of the uploaded photo. The data contains information about blur, noise, darkness, and whether the photo is an interior. The closer the value is to one, the more likely it is to belong to the specified category.

api_list.name: /segmentation/ceiling
api_list.description: Get a binary ceiling mask represented as an image encoded as a base64 string in the normal case. Or vectorized_mask as a list of (x, y) points if vectorized is set to true in the query options. These points describe a polygon around a binary mask from a regular query. Convenient if the server response size is painful for you.

api_list.name: /analysis/camera
api_list.description: Get a set of camera parameters that correspond to the moment of shooting for the uploaded image. Fov, pitch and roll parameters are represented in radians, height in meters.

api_list.name: /segmentation
api_list.description: Get a semantic segmentation as an image in RGB format where all colors corresponds to some entities detected on uploaded image. Check this table to determine color/entity bindings.

api_list.name: /interior/walls
api_list.description: Get the full set of computer vision artifacts. Includes semantic segmentation, object detection, 3D reconstruction, and camera data for the walls from the uploaded photo.

api_list.name: /detection/floor
api_list.description: Get a dataset in the form of x, y coordinates describing the plane of the floor in the uploaded photo. The x, y values are presented as a percentage of the photo size with the origin in the upper left corner. To get the value in px, you need to convert as x * image_width for x axis and y * image_height for y axis.

api_list.name: /interior
api_list.description: Get the full set of computer vision artifacts. Includes semantic segmentation, object detection, 3D reconstruction, and camera data for all recognizable objects from the uploaded photo.

api_list.name: /detection/walls
api_list.description: Get a set of wall objects. The points parameter of the wall object is a list of x, y coordinates describing the plane of the wall. The x, y values are presented as a percentage of the photo size with the origin in the upper left corner. To get the value in pixels you need to convert as x * image_width for the x axis and y * image_height for the y axis. Parameters cx, cy are used to describe the center of the detected wall.

api_list.name: /interior/windows
api_list.description: Get the full set of computer vision artifacts. Includes semantic segmentation, object detection, 3D reconstruction, and camera data for the windows from the uploaded photo.

api_list.name: /detection/windows
api_list.description: Get a set of wall objects. The points parameter of the wall object is a list of x, y coordinates describing the plane of the wall. The x, y values are presented as a percentage of the photo size with the origin in the upper left corner. To get the value in pixels you need to convert as x * image_width for the x axis and y * image_height for the y axis. Parameters cx, cy are used to describe the center of the detected wall.

api_list.name: /detection/ceiling
api_list.description: Get a dataset in the form of x, y coordinates describing the plane of the ceiling in the uploaded photo. The x, y values are presented as a percentage of the photo size with the origin in the upper left corner. To get the value in px, you need to convert as x * image_width for x axis and y * image_height for y axis.

api_list.name: /detection
api_list.description: Get a set of detected interior surfaces such as floor, ceiling, walls. The response is presented in the right-handed coordinate system.

api_list.name: /interior/floor
api_list.description: Get the full set of computer vision artifacts. Includes semantic segmentation, object detection, 3D reconstruction, and camera data for the floor from the uploaded photo.

api_list.name: /interior/ceiling
api_list.description: Get the full set of computer vision artifacts. Includes semantic segmentation, object detection, 3D reconstruction, and camera data for the ceiling from the uploaded photo.

api_list.name: /reconstruction/ceiling
api_list.description: Obtain a 3D reconstruction of the ceiling surface. The data includes an area property calculated in square meters and a list of 3D coordinates that characterize the surface of the ceiling.

api_list.name: /reconstruction/walls
api_list.description: Get a 3D reconstruction of the wall as a set of wall objects. The wall object includes width and height properties calculated in a meters. The wall normal vector, taking into account the origin of the coordinate system at the camera position. The 3d points list belonging to the wall, where the x, y, z coordinates are in meters.

api_list.name: /reconstruction
api_list.description: Obtain a 3D reconstruction of all detected surfaces from uploaded photo. The response is presented in the right-handed coordinate system.

api_list.name: /reconstruction/floor
api_list.description: Obtain a 3D reconstruction of the floor surface. The data includes an area property calculated in square meters and a list of 3D coordinates that characterize the surface of the floor.
